Class Bitly

extends java.lang.Object

shorten

public BitlyResponse shorten(java.lang.String longUrl,
                             java.lang.String domain)
                      throws BitlyException
'shorten' API call

Parameters:
longUrl - url which needs to be shortened. (this will be url-encoded)
domain - domain for shortening [bit.ly]
Returns:
response object
Throws:
BitlyException - Available options for 'domain': "bit.ly" and "j.mp"

clicks_by_day

public BitlyResponse clicks_by_day(java.lang.String[] shortUrls,
                                   java.lang.String[] hashes,
                                   int days)
                            throws BitlyException
'clicks_by_day' API call

Parameters:
shortUrls - list of short urls to be expanded
hashes - list of hashes of short urls to be expanded
days - number of days for which to retrieve the data [7]
Returns:
response object
Throws:
BitlyException - 'days' must be between 1 and 30 (both inclusive)
